name: Executive
description: At EBEC, we focus on innovation and entrepreneurship, creating opportunities for young leaders to grow. By fostering collaboration and empowering the next generation, we aim to shape the future of business and industry.

name: IT Department
description: Bring the power of Technology to the huge field of business! Our IT department is dedicated to providing innovative solutions and ensuring the smooth operation of all technological aspects within the company.

name: HR Department
description: Managing talent to ensure sustainable success and growth. Our HR team is committed to fostering a positive work environment and supporting the professional development of all employees.

name: Events Department
description: Our Events Department excels in organizing impactful events that leave lasting impressions. We focus on creating engaging experiences that bring people together and align with our club’s mission.

name: Multimedia Department
description: The Multimedia Department is responsible for producing high-quality content that effectively communicates our brand’s message. From design to video production, we deliver creative visuals that resonate with our audience.

name: Relex Department
description: The Relex Department works to build valuable external relationships and collaborations that drive growth. We focus on expanding opportunities and strengthening our network to support the club's mission.

name: Design Department
description: Our Design Department brings creativity to life, communicating our club's message through innovative visuals. We craft impactful designs that represent our brand and engage our community.
